mapper.select: SELECT scheduleId, startDate, label, title FROM Schedule;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Schedule (coupleId, title, description, startDate, endDate, label, location, createdBy, scope) VALUES (#{coupleId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{label}, #{location}, #{createdBy}, #{scope})
mapper.update: UPDATE Schedule SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, label = #{label}, location = #{location} WHERE scheduleId = #{scheduleId}
